titleStmt.title: SII 5.259: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 259. (A.R. No. 583 of 1893). ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE SAME SHRINE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svastiśrī . mahārāya tevarāya Uṭaiyaār piṟutivirācciyam paṇṇi Aruḷāniṉṟa Iravuttiri varuṣam cittirai 10 5 tiyati naraiyaṉurnāṭṭu Uṭaiyapirāṭṭicaruppetimaṅkalattu nāyiṉār Aḻakiyacokkaṉār koyilil tevarkanmika
m paṇṇikuṭutta paricāvatu Innāyiṉārkoyil tulukkavāṇattile Iṟaṅkal paṭṭu māyanāyakkaṟku tanmamāka taraṅkaiyāmaṉṟāṭiyār tiruppaṇi ceyvikkaiyil muṭṭattil Ariyarāya Uṭaiyar nāḷile Innāyi
vvūril naṭantuvanta tevatāṉamāyūravarvacamāyiruntu Ippoḻutu viṭuvitta nilamāvatu Ivvūril piṟivu koḻiñcipāṭiyil muṉṟāṅkarai Ūñcalpāṟai carivutaṭi 4ṉāl nilam Orumāvum tirumālaippaṟam nilam Araimā
nilam Orumā Araiyum meṟpaṭi Uḷḷa pirivu virāntamaṅkalam paṉṉiraṇṭām Oḻuku teṉpaḷḷi Ammai piṭāripaṭṭikku kiḻpuṟam taṭi 4ṉāl nilam Iraṇṭumāvum Āka nilam mūṉṟumā Araiyum cantirātittavarai
celvatāka Utakapūṟuvatānam paṇṇi cempilum cilaiyilum veṭṭiṉamaiyil Ippaṭikku kāṅkaiyar Eḻuttu
Ippaṭikku Avanāci nāyakkar Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku virapāṇṭiya pramaārāyaṉ Eḻuttu Ivai Aṟivuṭaināyiṉān Eḻuttu
Ivai kaṟpakanāyiṉān Eḻuttu Ivai Uṭaiyān Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 5.259 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Renato Dávalos.
